item.title: What Is Wrong With This Code?
item.dc:creator: @Zezerex Zezerex
item.description:
@Zezerex wrote:

This is the code for my d claws…i have it almost correct, it does the right emote, takes up the correct amount of special, but when it attacks, it only does two hits each time, not four, how do i make it four?

}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){
specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 600, 2068);
npcDamage(8);
}

ps…how do i make the gray box around the code?

Read full topic
